description: defines the host volume conditions that will be enabled by a policy for pods to use. It requires the path prefix to be defined.

pathPrefix.description:
is the path prefix that the host volume must match. It does not support `*`. Trailing slashes are trimmed when validating the path prefix with a host path.

Examples: `/foo` would allow `/foo`, `/foo/` and `/foo/bar` `/foo` would not allow `/food` or `/etc/foo`
